Experience.title: Research Assistant
Experience.description:
• Research Areas: Computer Vision, Image Inpainting & Outpainting, and Audio‑Visual Sound Source Separation
• Collaborated with Qualcomm in San Diego on designing deep learning frameworks with Pytorch for two image outpainting projects, and one of them has resulted in a first‑authored conference paper in 2021

Experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
Experience.description:
• Developed an automated system by designing APIs with Python, SQL, and Shell Script to facilitate other engineers’ model training processes, such as filtering, processing, and auto‑labeling data from the internal shared database
• Improved the accuracy of a multi‑class object detection model by 5% mAP compared to a previous model
• Investigated 3 kinds of object detection models for different camera types and object classes, which led to products
• Collaborated with senior engineers to develop and maintain an asynchronous server for internal data management
• Technical Support: troubleshot devices (e.g. cameras, Wi‑Fi routers, and PoEs) for nearly 100 retail stores
